links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Size up for bustier girls
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, made me feel pretty and girly with it on, but in a size XS I felt it was too lowcut and I had a hard time keeping my bra hidden. Should have sized up to an S.
Wrap dress, could wear a bra or not. Fits true to size. A little on the shorter side but still comfortable length at my height.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Size up for bustier girls
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, made me feel pretty and girly with it on, but in a size XS I felt it was too lowcut and I had a hard time keeping my bra hidden. Should have sized up to an S.
Wrap dress, could wear a bra or not. Fits true to size. A little on the shorter side but still comfortable length at my height.
I loved where these pants hit. These look great with a flowy blouse/tank half-tucked in, and...pretty much any other top! Thick enough material where you won’t see through, but airy enough!

links_reviews_title: Heritage fit = order two sizes larger.
links_reviews_text: These were too small, and wasn’t able to wear.
True to size with a figure-hugging high-waisted fit. They were cropped on me (I'm tall! 5'11"). So flattering and comfortable that I can easily see these becoming a favorite of mine
These shorts are the perfect fit and such a great length, They're still stylish while being appropriate
Levi’s is like that....the blue wash of these was FABULOUS and fit great, this black wash in same size was baggy :/ cute in the right size though!! A summer go-to, purchasing the blue

The pair I received was brand new, what an honor :) The destroyed style and length were awesome. I got my normal size but they had more of the relaxed baggy look, which is cool but I'm going to try next time with a size down to get a slightly tighter fit.
Love these! got them in black and the light blue jean they fit great - high waisted and love that they aren't super short. love the cut right about mid thigh. Keeping for sure!
Love these! got them in black and the light blue jeans the fit great - high waisted and love that they aren't super short. love the cut right about mid thigh. Keeping for sure!
These shorts are comfy and go with everything! They have a bit of a stretch so if you like them fitted I recommend going a size down.
I LOVE these shorts and rented them with the intention to buy however the size I ordered was too small. I would suggest sizing up 1 size if you want to order these shorts. Wish I could have worn em!
Loving the length. Comfortable! Sized up and they still fit pretty tight as I have an athletic build. If you are hoping for a baggy fit, might not be for you. Super cute tho!

I’m so sad about these shorts. I specifically chose this out because they are longer and looked looser - and shorts for me are usually a sensitive subject - I have a small waist but carry my weight in my butt and thighs - I know this so I sized up. But even sizing up I couldn’t even get this over my butt end they were HUGGING my thighs in such an unflattering way. I was so depressed it was really a confidence lowering experience to say the least. If you’re curvy - these aren’t for you, and I’m in that boat. Bummed out. But glad I was able to try these on first before buying online.
It was too cold to wear these when I rented these BUT I loved them so much I bought them. I’m too old for short shorts but love the fit of these. They hit mid thigh. I sized up for a slouchier look.
Fit super well. Great stretch and length. True to size.
I wanted to love these, but they honestly just made me look like I was wearing a box.
Perfect length for on the go with kids . So comfortable I didn’t have to tug on these at all all day. So good I’m buying!
I normally struggle with Levi’s because they leave a gap from my back to my booty but these didn’t do that they were great! I ended up buying them. Perfect length also
The perfect “short short”! Covers my bum, but is still form fitting and so flattering!
Absolutely love! Buying! Size up in Levi’s always!!
Great shorts for everyday wear!
Cute on the model but these weren’t just tight they were like impossible to button in a size I normally wear.
I’m obsessed with this mid length short and refuse to give them back. The waist is mid/high rise with only a small gap; good stretch and the dye didn’t stain my skin.
I sized up, hoping to roll these (which wasnt cute), and I wish I got my true size. I think they're more flattering fitting a little tighter / less baggy. I typically wear a 27/28

LOVE these 501s! In the trend of all things mom-jeans, I am so glad to find a pair of mid-thighs that are super flattering, perfect length, perfect leg and waist fit, and have the distressed bottom. They look FANTASTIC with boots or any pair of shoes really, but are the perfect length to elongate your legs without showing all your upper thigh. Huge fan and so glad they are mine to keep!
I've never had shorts that don't ride up as little as these ride up. The cut is flattering and although it's stiff denim, they are comfy. If you're between sizes, I'd order a size down though!
I am a size 32 jeans. I could not get these half way up my legs. There are no stretch in these jean shorts.
Way too big for me, could have sized down 2-3 sizes.

These were perfect. They fit me true to size, with a little wiggle room to look like real vintage Levi’s. I’m always searching for cool but flattering and comfortable shorts for Disneyland days, and these are it! I’m a mom of two, so I like my booty covered and these were a nice length without feeling lame. I am definitely purchasing these. I paired them with a vintage tee and vans.
TTS, True mid-thigh length, no stretch to the denim
These shorts are the perfect fit and such a great length, They're still stylish while being appropriate
Levi’s is like that....the blue wash of these was FABULOUS and fit great, this black wash in same size was baggy :/ cute in the right size though!! A summer go-to, purchasing the blue

The pair I received was brand new, what an honor :) The destroyed style and length were awesome. I got my normal size but they had more of the relaxed baggy look, which is cool but I'm going to try next time with a size down to get a slightly tighter fit.
Love these! got them in black and the light blue jean they fit great - high waisted and love that they aren't super short. love the cut right about mid thigh. Keeping for sure!
Love these! got them in black and the light blue jeans the fit great - high waisted and love that they aren't super short. love the cut right about mid thigh. Keeping for sure!
These shorts are comfy and go with everything! They have a bit of a stretch so if you like them fitted I recommend going a size down.
I LOVE these shorts and rented them with the intention to buy however the size I ordered was too small. I would suggest sizing up 1 size if you want to order these shorts. Wish I could have worn em!

links_reviews_title: crepey, bouncy fabric, particularly cropped top
links_reviews_text: - crop length is adjustable - very dramatic sleeves - fabric is flowy and unique - beautiful with a higher waisted skirt

links_reviews_title: fit as expected, really fun fit
links_reviews_text: -really bouncy fabric -fits as a classic crop

links_reviews_title: True to size, but is tight
links_reviews_text: -fit as expected, but might need to go braless - a little tight in the shoulders - very lightweight -has some stretch

links_reviews_title: unique and statement making, adjustable shoulders
links_reviews_text: - makes a statement, exaggerated ruffles and sleeve details - stiffer cotton fabric, needs ironing - would wear with a high-waisted bottom

links_reviews_title: Great pattern -- weird material, runs small
links_reviews_text: I rented a small in this (size 4/6) and it's a little uncomfortably tight in the waist, so I'd say it runs small. It's also shorter than I'd like (hits me at my ankle - I'm 5'9"). Also feel like it's important to share that the material is the same material that lacrosse shorts are made out of. Weird. Pretty, striking print though!
really cool print and mesh PE short material. Full length on me. Looked cute with platform sandals

Has an elastic waist but felt snug in my usual size. I recommend sizing up for a comfortable fit. This skirt was ankle-length on me and I'm tall (5'11") so if you are petite, this may be a little too long for you

Super comfortable, flowy tank. The straps tie at the shoulders for easy adjustment. Material is thin but soft. The little metal detail between the cups adds a unique touch to an otherwise simple tank for summer!
Wore this a few times. It’s a little loose. I’m 34c and wore pasties. I tried double sided tape to secure my boobs in but it wouldn’t stick to material. So I was a little conscious of that.

links_reviews_title: So cute but not for big busts
links_reviews_text: I love the top and I usually wear a small but I think with a larger chest the cups didn’t fit (I’m a 32d)

Super comfortable, flowy tank. The straps tie at the shoulders for easy adjustment. Material is thin but soft. The little metal detail between the cups adds a unique touch to an otherwise simple tank for summer!
Wore this a few times. It’s a little loose. I’m 34c and wore pasties. I tried double sided tape to secure my boobs in but it wouldn’t stick to material. So I was a little conscious of that.

links_reviews_title: So cute but not for big busts
links_reviews_text: I love the top and I usually wear a small but I think with a larger chest the cups didn’t fit (I’m a 32d)

links_reviews_title: Very high slit, but true to size
links_reviews_text: -thin fabric -lined but still sheer -adjustable straps in back -tit as expected -great nightlife vide

links_reviews_title: Very revealing, may have trouble with undergarments
links_reviews_text: - true to size - curve hugging - fabric very light and slightly sheer (can see undergarments through) - going out dress
Size down 1 size - large overall, beautiful coloring, would be flattering on all skin tones, fabric super comfortable but could wrinkle easily, would wear with heels for a non-traditional wedding

links_reviews_title: True to Size, Slightly Large in the Bust
links_reviews_text: True to size, slightly large in the bust (generous bust area), but fitted at the hip, needs a non-traditional bra (cut way low), tiers add a bit of volume, lightweight cotton
I absolutely love this dress but it was too big on me. The chest was too long and had too much material. The length was ok but still wouldn't recommend for petites

True to size with a relaxed fit. Buttons down the front and has a matching slip for neckline coverage. Length fell just below the knee on me (I'm tall! 5'11") and the buttons stop about 6" above that.
The dress itself is very pretty and ornate and would be perfect for the living doll cult.
It's beautiful and light weight. it's not lined and has areas where it is sheer. Although I'm not pictured wearing a tank underneath I would definitely have to unless I wanted my boobs to pop out!
-runs very tight, big in the waist but tight everywhere else -super lightweight and sheer -works well for parties for festivals
- runs small, rides up on curvy figure, but fits in the waist - high slit, mini slip - super floaty fabric - statement making for a night out - 'definitely designed for the booty'
Long arms, size down
Runs a little large - arms are long. Could size down! Asymmetrical hemline detail

links_reviews_title: A Pop of Color and Happiness
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size and is a bright burst of happiness in my closet. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for an easy, flowy dress for spring.

The favorite of this month's nuuly. Wore it at home, wore it to social distancing with family, wore whenever I could. So comfy, so vibrant. I've been gravitating towards brightly colored clothes to lift my mood during Oregon's stay at home order. This dress makes it easy. It's flowy, a little textured with the tiering, made of quality fabric, and bright neon green but with a little fading, which makes it's color a little less overpowering. As for fit, it's pretty true to size but runs small in the chest. I wore at home without a bra and in public with a supportive swim top and a small was just a teensy bit tight.

links_reviews_title: Super Cute but beware of fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so cute! The color was everything and I was so exited to wear it, but be aware the top part runs tight in the arms shoulder and chest area!
True to size, comes with slip, easy-breezy fabric, throw on and go, midi length
This was probably my favorite item in this month’s box. The fit was perfect and the material was a nice stretch poplin. Super cute to wear with jeans and sandals.
very cropped in a good way! Love the keyhole detail. Sleeves are a good length. There is probably good support if you have a larger chest. Fabric is a bit crunchy but it works for this style top

links_reviews_title: True to size, fitted with no stretch
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly in a size Small. The fabric doesn't have any stretch so if you're usually between sizes, I suggest sizing up to avoid it being too tight! Zips on one side from under the arm to the hem

links_reviews_title: So cute but huge on me
links_reviews_text: The sleeve length and overall length are really long. Looks super cute with the sleeves rolled though and pushed up though! Would be great over a dress or skirt

links_reviews_title: Cut for an oversized fit, sleeves are long
links_reviews_text: This blazer is cut for an oversized fit so it's big all around and the sleeves are extra long. It has a single button at the front to use as a closure but I belted it to mix it up! If you are on the more petite side, you can cuff or push up the sleeves so they don't extend past your hands
It is how it looks! Cute, casual day top. Good for springtime (even a quarantine spring)
Fits very well. Will definitely wear this a bunch, very cute and makes a statement in a fun feminine way.
This top makes it easy to look cute for anything. Fits great everywhere. Neckline and shoulders are a bit wide but doesn't look weird

I usually size up in LoveShackFancy but this fit perfectly in my usual size Small! This blouse fits loose throughout and has cuffed sleeves. The length was right at my hip bone making it perfect for wearing both tucked and untucked

Wore it with the green jeans from Nuuly. It's a soft, fitted sweater that's not-too-heavy for the current spring-like, transitional weather. I loved wearing it, but couldn't justify keeping it with the price tag (~$200-300), knowing it might only receive 1-2 more wearings.
Love everything about this. It's so soft, great length, and easy to tuck. The sleeves are slightly puffed and a great length as well

I usually size up in LoveShackFancy but this sweater fit true to size so the Small was great! It has a loose fit through the body and sleeves and has banded cuffs and hem. The length was above my hip bones but not too cropped
I wanted this to work but it's very very long. Would not recommend for petites. The bust area is also large and very low. Overall, just meant for someone at least 5'5"

This dress is STUNNING! It runs true to size with an attached tie at the waist so you can cinch in as tight as you like. I'm tall and this dress was midi in the front and ankle-length in the back on me so if you're petite you'll definitely need some heels to avoid the back dragging. It buttons down the front and doesn't have any stretch so if it's too snug the buttons may gap apart a little.
Pretty much full length on me which looked cute. Slightly see through at times. The elastic waist was a tiny bit loose but I typically wear a size 2 so I'd say it fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Loose elastic waist, size down for snug fit
links_reviews_text: Very pretty metallic fabric that can be dressed down with a t-shirt or dressed up with a silk cami. Elastic waist is pretty loose so if you prefer it to fit at your natural waist, size down one size
This skirt/ shorts/ skorts is so cute and fun. Pair with a solid colored top tucked in. Size up! I usually wear a size US 2 but the US 4 fit me perfectly.

I usually size up in Alice McCall but this was a perfect fit in my usual size US 4. This skort has a side zip closure and hidden attached shorts on the inside. Looks so cute with the matching top but if that's not available you could wear this with any white blouse or t-shirt
This made me a caftan convert. The color is a little dustier use than the photographs but still gorgeous. Rayon fabric looks and feels like silk and the bodice area has has a great lining.
This dress is comfy yet stylish and dressy! The perfect way to ease back into wearing real clothes post-isolation. I added a tie around the waist to give it a slightly more defined shape.
Exactly what I thought it would be. Silky, flowy dress. Great to be comfortable around at home and can be worn to an event like a wedding with the right accessories. Will rent again.
Huge and not flattering. I felt like a Victorian queen and not in a flattering way.

This was so fun and comfortable to wear around the house during quarantine! It comes with a belt that is not pictured. Definitely a loose fit. Fabric is nice and breathable. Wasn’t brave enough to wear this to the grocery store but I would rent it again once restaurants and bars open back up :)

This dress is really cute and the belt is the best part about it. The front pockets flap and are not sewn down to the dress which was the weirdest thing about this dress. It had a loose fit and was very comfortable to wear. Dress it up with accessories to make it look less casual and you'll feel effortlessly beautiful. Overall was pleased with the dress.
True to size, linen-type fabric, button front, cinching belt

This dress fits as a Small but note that you cannot put over your head - need to button down. No zipper to get into it. There is a slit in the front that is not revealing. It's a lighter material and would be good for warmer weather - fun for dancing!
True to size with a body-hugging fit. The sleeves are fitted and not very stretchy so if you have fuller/muscular arms (or generally want a looser fit), you may want to size up

Beautiful dress! I'm normally a small, but I should have sized up to a medium on this. The first time I tried it on, it was so tight I couldn't get the zipper to close at the bust. A day later, determined to get the dress on, I untied the back before trying to zip it up. Untying the back made a big difference and I was able to get it zipped up, but unfortunately it was still too uncomfortably tight to wear. There is zero stretch to this baby! If you have a medium or large chest/rib area, you will definitely want to size up!

links_reviews_title: Soft stretchy lace. What a beauty!
links_reviews_text: Beyond amazing dress. It is low cut with a high slit. But still classy and pretty. Stretchy soft lace. Very flattering.

Fitted through the bust, waist, and upper hips, then floats away from the body with a flowy skirt. Adjustable lace up detail at the bust to control the amount of skin you show. This is a size UK 4 (US 0) and it was pretty snug in the sleeves and neck. I would order a size UK 6 (US 2) in the future for a more comfortable.

This is probably the coolest dress you'll ever get to wear! The top was snug but fit well in this size. The lace up front can get cleavage-y and there is not much room for a larger chest. The slit comes up pretty high but falls nicely when walking and the length is definitely petite friendly. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

links_reviews_title: Flowy off the shoulder floral top
links_reviews_text: Floral top that is flowy. Fits well! I paired this with white jeans and it is a perfect look for spring/summer! The material is great so it never has to ironed!
Cheap material with weird fit on shoulders.
